alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Southern Mountains; Southwest Utah; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 02 at 10:56AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Millard and western Beaver Counties through 1130 AM MDT... At 1055 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 36 miles southeast of Garrison to 35 miles northwest of Beaver to 12 miles southeast of Milford. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milford, Minersville and Black Rock. This includes Utah Route 21 between mile markers 22 and 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
